definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: as a condition, ´[[בע]]: c. [[חוללתי]] was I brought forth Ps 51:7; c. [[גׇּוַע]] expire Jos 22:20 (P); c. [[מות]] die Je 31:30, Ez Eze 3:18, Eze 3:19, Eze 18:17, Eze 18:18, Eze 33:8, Eze 33:9.
